languages.text: If target fails Agility test they can't move in this turn.

traits.locale_text: If target fails Agility test they can't move in this turn.

languages.text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: Цель персонажа должна совершить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала стать {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженной{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} используется вместо {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wielder's target must pass an Agility resistance test or become immobilised until the start of the wielder's next turn. This ability is used instead of attacks of opportunity.

The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: Цель персонажа должна совершить проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала стать {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженной{/g} до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонажа. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} используется вместо {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атак по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цель персонажа должна совершить проверку Ловкости на сопротивление и в случае провала стать обездвиженной до начала следующего хода персонажа. Эта способность используется вместо атак по возможности.

languages.text: Kullanan kişinin hedefi, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Bu etki, kullanan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek sürer. {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Fırsat saldırısı{/g} yerine bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanılır.
languages.original_text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişinin hedefi, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur. Bu etki, kullanan kişinin bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcına dek sürer. {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Fırsat saldırısı{/g} yerine bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanılır.

languages.text: El objetivo del portador debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se usa en sustitución de {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo del portador debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedará {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} se usa en sustitución de {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会替代{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，效果持续至装备者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会替代{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。

languages.text: La cible de l'utilisateur doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi elle est {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisée{/g} jusqu'au début du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur. Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} remplace les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La cible de l'utilisateur doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, sans quoi elle est immobilisée{/g} jusqu'au début du prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur. Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} remplace les {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}行動不能{/g}となる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}の代わりに使用される。
languages.original_text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると使用者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}行動不能{/g}となる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}の代わりに使用される。

languages.text: Das Ziel des Trägers muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} bestehen, um nicht bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} eingesetzt.
languages.original_text: The wielder's target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of the wielder's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} is used instead of {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel des Trägers muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit bestehen, um nicht bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} wird anstelle von {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffen{/g} eingesetzt.
